cpu7501asm.h
1 #pragma once
2 
3 enum { // AsmAdressingMode
4  AM_UNKNOWN = 0,
5  AM_IMPLIED,
6  AM_IMMEDIATE,
7  AM_ABSOLUTE,
8  AM_INDIRECT,
9  AM_ZP,
10  AM_ZPIX,
11  AM_ZPIY,
12  AM_ABSOLUTEIX,
13  AM_ABSOLUTEIY,
14  AM_INDIRECTINDEXED,
15  AM_INDEXEDINDIRECT,
16  AM_RELATIVE
17 };
18 
19 typedef struct INSTR
20 {
21  char name[4];
22  unsigned int type;
23  int cycles;
24  unsigned char ext;
25  unsigned char iclass;
26 } instructions;
27 
28 /*
29  types : 1 - one-unsigned char instruction - eg.: nop
30  2 - two-unsigned char instruction eg.: lda #$20
31  3 - three-unsigned char instruction eg.: jmp $2000
32  4 - three-unsigned char indirect instruction eg.: jmp ($2000)
33  5 - two-unsigned char zero slap eg.: lda $50
34  6 - two-unsigned char zero slap X indexed eg.: lda $60,x
35  7 - two-unsigned char zero slap Y indexed eg.: ldx $70,y
36  8 - three-unsigned char X indexed eg.: sta $8000,x
37  9 - three-unsigned char Y indexed eg.: sta $8000,y
38  10 - two-unsigned char zero slap Y, indexed eg.: lda ($a0),Y
39  11 - two-unsigned char zero slap X, indexed eg.: lda ($b0,X)
40  12 - two-unsigned char relative jump eg.: beq $c000
41 
42  ext : 0 - regular assembler instruction mnemonic
43  1 - extended assembler instruction mnemonic
44  2 - not an assembly instruction
45 
46  class : 0 - special BRK,JAM,NOP : nothing affected
47  1 - affects PC
48  2 - affects A only
49  3 - affects X only
50  4 - affects Y only
51  5 - affects memory
52 
53  9 - not dealt with
54 */
55 
56 const int typlen[13]={0,1,2,3,3,2,2,2,3,3,2,2,2};
57
